content.detailedDescription: Walking a friend to his car talking then looked up and saw the orbs ran in the house and got my wife who also saw them. they changed patterns multiple times . i was in awe and so was my friend and wife . the orbs done this for around 15 minutes then suddenly vanished.  i posted on facebook and a friend on ther had seen them too.
content.summary: 15 to 20 orange orbs

content.detailedDescription: Was outside using snow thrower, saw three objects heading south, abruptly turned 90 degrees to east, heading my direction from eagle ridge/payson. they were slow moving and when almost overhead climbed into clouds to clear mountains. had shut off my machine and there was no noise at all. my elevation is about 6500 feet and the clouds were below the top of the mountains, probably about 7500 feet max, mountain is 8700 feet. the time was 7:10pm mountain standard time. there was only a steady orange light, no flashing red , green or white lights associated with aircraft and orange lights were soft, not glaring as landing lights would be. i lost sight when they climbed through the clouds. the reason i first noticed then was the soft glow and the turn in unison, and as it got closer no other lights required by faa regulations, and if aircraft landing light would have been heading southerly direction, and brightness and color remained constant in both directions
content.summary: 3 object heading south abruptly 90 degree turn to east cimbed mountain

content.detailedDescription: About 7:25pm outside in backyard and saw 2 red-orange glowing objects flying in sky one above the other. never saw anything like it and quickly ran inside and told my husband to come look. he'd never seen anything like it either and we wondered if military or ufo. the objects stopped flying, hovered one above the other mid air, then the lights turned off still mid air we didn't see them again.
content.summary: 2 red-orange glowing round objects flying together, stopped mid air, hovered, lights turned off

content.detailedDescription:
On  december 17,2014 in the mid morning i was piloting a business jet approaching springbank airport which is located west of calgary. approaching from the north i was approximately 10 miles north of cochrane flying parallel to and a couple miles west of  highway 22 and descending through 8500' above sea level or about 4500 ' above the ground. it was a bright sunny morning and i was just looking at the scenery when i spotted a black object along the highway maybe 2 miles ahead of me that was moving fast northbound ( towards me). after looking at it for a few seconds i thought i would time it along the section lines on the ground and calculate a speed of this very fast car. within a few seconds i  realized that what i thought was going to be a corvette in fact  was a  flat black colored tubular object that was flying low level over the highway. it was cigar shaped and not flying with the end of the cigar pointing forward but perpendicular with the long edge in the direction of flight. as i was flying south at some 230  knots and the object was coming towards me the whole encounter happened fast but fortunately i was getting closer and could get a better look at the craft. as i came abeam the object it was wider than the road and difficult to estimate the height, but probably within a couple hundred feet of the ground. then maybe stranger than actually seeing this object as it was nearest my position directly off my left wingtip it vanished within 1/2 a second. it quickly turned translucent where i could see a blurred image of the field and road through it while it had a darker edge along the outline of the craft. the object very quickly appeared clearer and within a fraction of a second it  disappeared from view. i had no idea what i had seen and scanned the area around the track the object was flying thinking maybe it was the top of a wing of a pipeline patrol aircraft that i had seen and that maybe the aircraft banked and i lost sight of it. scanning the area it never reappeared. i looked at the tcas (traffic collision avoidance system ) display in the cockpit that shows all the aircraft that are being interrogated by atc radar in the area and although there were many other aircraft to the south and west  there was nothing on the display near me. looking back towards where i last saw the object i noticed cars on the road heading south and this helped judge the size and speed of the object compared to a "known ground based object". the cars were both much smaller and slower than the object and were within a mile of it when it disappeared.  the drivers may have seen the same phenomena. i estimate the object as between 50 -80 feet in length and 15-20 feet wide.  it moved on a steady track and at a constant speed. i mentally timed it at crossing a half mile in under 12 seconds or around 160 mph a speed not particularly fast for a small airplane but faster than what patrol aircraft use when flying low level. there were no discernible markings, windows, lights, or other features. just a flat black rectangular cigar shaped object. the entire encounter was at the most 30 seconds long as the closing speed on the object was in the neighborhood of 400 mph. there were several passengers on the aircraft but they were concentrating on a conversation in the aircraft, i doubt anyone saw the object and i didn't ask as i enjoy my job. likewise as the object never showed on my tcas, there wasn't much point in asking atc if they noticed anything.  besides it had disappeared at that point.

on a side note, as a pilot with 30 years of experience i have seen sights and objects which i could always dismiss as meteors, cloud formations, atmospheric phenomena such as inversions, other aircraft, satellites, etc. even if this object had kept its track i may have been passed off as some type of uav, however as i witnessed from a relatively close range the disappearance of the object i have no doubt it was something that is either cutting edge top secret military tech or something that i have no explanation of.
content.summary: Cigar  shaped flying object observed by commercial pilot while flying

content.detailedDescription:
Unusual airplane light in the west sky approaching ria. it looked like a plane on fire coming on for a normal approach to the airport by start in to turn as airplanes do.  then the light abruptly turns to the north with a quickness that no airplane landing at richmond can perform.  the light traveled straight, but seemed to vary it's speed.  no sound was heard and usually the clouds make airplanes louder. density of the air, i believe.  past over a roof top and gone.

photo and video i took are crap.  i didn't have time to stabilize.
content.summary: Object looking like an airplane on fire headed to ria for landing, turns north.

content.detailedDescription: 1974 or 75 army tank competition laying on tank waiting our turn. looked up and say a star like ufo zigzagging in the sky above us. put my thumb and fore finger to see how far zigzag movement was between thumb and finger about 1 inch. it was moving forward in a zigzag movement for about 30 seconds. then it zoomed out of sight leaving a light trail, full throttle.
content.summary: Starlike 30 sec. zigzag movement left trail zoomed out of site

content.detailedDescription:
We were on a ghost tour walking east behind the historicalsociety / old train station looking toward the sponge docks. there was a bat flying around us and we ducked down but looking up at sky. my daughter saw it first and said omg what is that? she pointed in the sky and we all looked. 

i was in a wheelchair and took a picture but i wasn't trying to take a picture of the ufo, it was the bat i was trying for. at first my husband said it was the moon but the moon was to the right of the object. we pointed that out to him. it was traveling really fast as it went from one part of the sky to the other part in less than a minute and glowed kinda an orange/red color
content.summary: Bat flying above us on ghost tour

content.detailedDescription:
I live in vallejo ca. on a hill that provides me with a view of mare island, the northern end of the san francisco bay, and parts of marin county across the bay.  
on the evening of dec. 15, 2014 at approximately 9:15 to 9:30 i was sitting in the front room watching tv.  from a nearby window i happened to notice a light moving slowly across the sky.  at first i paid no attention because helicopters and planes are ubiquitous in the sf bay area.  then it occurred to me that this object did not have the blinking lights that are on all planes and helicopters.  it was just a round orange glow moving across the sky like some iridescent pumpkin.  i got up and went outside onto the front deck.  as soon as i got outside it became apparent that there were more than just one of them.   following behind the first one came another one and then another one and then another one and then more of them.  there was a high overcast but beneath the clouds visibility was clear.  i ran back into the house and got my wife to come and see.  when we got back outside there were even more of them.  the spacing between them seemed to be about equal distance (maybe 1/4 mile).  they first appeared out over san pablo bay which is the northern end of san francisco bay.  they were moving slowly in single file from south to north and disappeared behind trees beyond my view.  they went in and out of cloud cover and when they were in cloud cover they reflected a brilliant orange glow off the clouds.  i've tried to come up with a descriptive analogy and here is the best i could do.  as they past through he clouds they looked like a campfire glowing in the distance on a pitch black night.  
i don't know how many there were because i don't know if the first one i saw was the beginning of this procession or somewhere in the middle.   suffice it to say, there were quite a few.  it this point i was kicking myself because i didn't take any pictures.  i thought, oh well,  hundreds of other people must have seen this,  there will be pictures all over the news.  much to my surprise, i've seen nothing of this event on local news or anywhere else.
content.summary: Multiple orange glowing objects moving south to north

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i had just gone to bed and as i lay my head on the pillow observed what i thought was a very bright star.

2.  i noticed the object because of it's brightness

3.  i thought it was a star

4.  it would hover and then dart (like a hummingbird) sideways, stop then fly up with incredible speed before darting down, stopping and then moving another direction.

5.  i got my binoculars and was surprised to see it had what appeared to be an appendage (tube) hanging from the bottom of the glowing ball with another much smaller ball attached to the bottom of the tube.  
having worked for air canada in many airports around north america, i am very familiar with all types of aircraft.  this was not an aircraft of any type known.  
my bedroom has a large floor to ceiling window next to my bed that looks right out onto malaspina channel (salish sea) and i was very fascinated that an object with such a strange configuration would move so fast and change directions  (literally) in a blink of an eye. 

after approximately 45 minutes i had to go to bed, but as i lay down it was still "hovering" and darting in the sky towards texada island.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: A bright sparkllng light with a

content.detailedDescription:
Two events around this time period.  i know it was summer clear day i was very young and my mother saw as well.  she passed away in 1998.  i am willing to talk to someone but i never forgot these events.

1) first many times over this time period i saw many jets flying very low over the ford city football field.  during the morning evening and i could hear them at night,

2) first event i was told was a jet - i still do not believe it was, it was a dark boomerang shape.  no lights sounds.  it flew from the east to a north west direction  heading kept elevating.   when i explained this to my uncle and father they said it was a new fighter plane.  it was a boomerang.

3) this one i know was neither.  it was a cigar shape with two items that looked like wings more towards the center of the object.  it was about 3 pm in the summer.   no noise or clouds etc.  it appeared black but that may be because it was silhouetted by the sun.   we noticed this directly overhead and when we first saw it - it appeared very high and using your fingers to measure it was as wide as i could spread my thumb and pointer.  it continued to go straight up until it was no longer visible.

the boomerang did not appear to be a jet - but it could have been.  the second if possible i will attach a crudely drawn picture.  the first just draw a boomerang.  for the cigar with wings i could not find any reports on the internet like this one.  i found many boomerangs but they had lights.  my sightings had no lights.
content.summary: During the year around 1976 many sights of very low flying militay jets.  saw 2 different over this time period.

content.detailedDescription: 12/26/2014 8pm my husband, daughter and i where out side on the back patio star gazing toward the eastern sky.  we noticed what looked like a very bright star or planet on the eastern horizon.  it was stationary and did not move.  it was much larger, extremely larger than any other star.  the bright pulsating light seemed to change shape as we watched it. first looked kind of star shaped and pulsating light, than looked like cigar shaped pulsating light, etc.  we viewed it for about 30 minutes. did not move. attached are photos.
content.summary: 12/26/14 8pm we where star gazing in the back yard towards the eastern sky and witnessed something much larger and brighter than a star pulsating with bright lights. pictures attached.

content.detailedDescription: Was on a 10 minute break from work, was in the smoking shelter, noticed something moving, saw a square shaped object spinning whilst hovering and moving at the same time, had 4 bright orange lights in each corner and blue lights towards centre. i didnt know what it was, i also tried to take a photo but my phone froze and would not work. i showed the one girl next to me and we both just stared at it. felt shocked, confused and could not believe my eyes. it just disapeared behind trees.
content.summary: Square shape, hovering whilst spinning and moving. then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Was on a 10 minute break from work, was in the smoking shelter, noticed something moving, saw a square shaped object spinning whilst hovering and moving at the same time, had 4 bright orange lights in each corner and blue lights towards centre. i didnt know what it was, i also tried to take a photo but my phone froze and would not work. i showed the one girl next to me and we both just stared at it. felt shocked, confused and could not believe my eyes. it just disapeared behind trees.
content.summary: Square shape, hovering whilst spinning and moving. then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Esto ocurriã³  un dã­a de entre semana del invierno del 2000 sobre las 22:00h, una noche clara y estrellada (vamos una noche preciosa). me dirigã­a a sueca a devolver unos dvd , pasã© por el cruce de corbera sin ver nada y en el cruce de fortaleny (despuã©s de una recta de unos 4km) vi una persona conocida fuera del coche y mirando direcciã³n corbera, intuitivamente mire por el retrovisor y vi una luz  bastante grande suspendida frente a la sierra de corbera, en ese momento no le di mã¡s importancia, pero cuando estaba bajando el puente de sueca me entrã³ la curiosidad y acelerã© para terminar pronto y volver de regreso y pararme hablar con la persona conocida y ver quã© hacã­a allã­. cuando regresã© esta persona ya no estaba pero la luz seguã­a allã­, parã© el coche en el cruce y bajã©. la luz era blanca y la tenã­a a la altura de mis ojos y a unos 4km y la veã­a de grande como un plato de comer, yo buscaba referencias para asimilar el tamaã±o y le puedo asegurar que era enorme, esa zona es un marjal y hay una visibilidad inmejorable. estuve al menos 10 minutos mirã¡ndola, con los bellos de punta, sin poder comprender lo que estaba viendo y con unas ganas locas de montarme al coche y acercarme y coger el mã³vil para llamar al 112 (los mã³viles todavã­a no tenã­an cã¡mara), pero al mismo tiempo no querã­a quitar la vista porque temã­a  que en ese momento desapareciese sin saber cã³mo. empecã© a darme cuenta de ciertos detalles, como que la luz no reflejaba no desprendã­a luminaria, con lo grande que era tenã­a que haber iluminado toda la sierra, y como podã­a estar eso ahã­ con lo grande que era y suspendido en el aire y no hacer nada de ruido si cualquier aviã³n que pasa o helicã³ptero se oye una barbaridad, incluso los coches de la autopista (que por cierto no pasã³ ni uno).   cuando por fin decidã­ mentalmente subir al coche pero sin llegar a moverme, la luz empezã³ a cambiar de color y moverse lentamente como si vibrara y al mismo tiempo empezã³ como a darse la vuelta, y fue entonces cuando se apreciã³ perfectamente lo que era ( en ese momento tuve una explosiã³n interna de adrenalina que empezã³ a subirme desde la punta de los pies hasta la cabeza, y se me pusieron los pelos de punta), era impresionante no podã­a creerme lo que estaba viendo, no tenã­a capacidad de raciocinio para entenderlo, no me querã­a sugestionar ni sacar conclusiones precipitadas, simplemente no me querã­a perder detalle de lo que realmente estaba viendo. al pricipio solo veã­a una luz blanca circular que no reflejaba luz flotando  hasta que en un momento dado esa luz empezo a cambiar a un color amarillo rojizo y entonces es cuando al rededor de la luz empezã³ a verse un anillo enorme y destellar luces de todos los colores y desacerse el camuflage ( la luz solo era el centro) y realmente fuã© en ese momento cuando apreciã© lo que era !!Una nave espacial enormeâ¡â¡  vã­ lo que en el argot llaman una nave nodriza, yo he calculado por referencias del terreno que tenã­a aprox. unos 200.000 metros cuadrados o lo que es lo mismo 500m diã¡metro. la nave estaba en vertical ( como una moneda de canto ) y empezã³ a girar sobre su eje y se puso en horizontal, no podã­a creer lo que estaba viendo, era enorme y se estaba moviendo como flotando y sin hacer ruido. estaba viendo con mucha nitidez las ventanitas de colores que tenã­a en el anillo central, al poco tiempo empezã³ abrirse  una compuerta en un lateral de la nave ( como si se desvaneciera el fuselaje) y vi el interior de la nave aunque debido a la luz interior muy potente no podã­a apreciar bien su interior, al momento empezaron  a ascender del suelo unas luces que llegaron a ser seis esferas  que debido a la luz que desprendã­an no terminaba de ver bien su forma, una vez que todas estubieron alineadas dieron una vuelta alrededor de la nave y en formaciã³n empezaron a entrar al interior de la nave una tras otra, cuando terminaron se cerrã³ la puerta y la nave empezo como a vibrar, se desplazã³ lentamente hacia la izquierda y hacia arriba y de repente con una aceleraciã³n increible hacia la derecha saliã³ de la atmosfera terrestre ( como en una catapulta), en un momento pasã³ a ser un punto blanco en el cielo que empezã³ hacer ziczacs y alinearse con las estrellas, y poco a poco el puntito desaparecã³ en el firmamento. la percepciã³n del tiempo no la tengo muy clara porque no estuve controlando el reloj, pero se ala hora que salã­ de casa y a la hora que lleguã©,por lo que he deducido que estube obsevando mã­nimo 30-35minutos.
subã­ al coche y me dirigã­ a casa, no me crucã© con nadie ni siquiera el rato que estuve en el cruce mirando, cuanto mã¡s me acercaba a corbera mã¡s me daba cuenta lo grande y lo enorme que era lo que habã­a visto. cuando lleguã© a casa mi mujer embarazada de mi hija estaba durmiendo y le intentã© comentar que habã­a visto algo pero ella me dijo que me acostara y que maã±ana ya hablarã­amos. al dã­a siguiente me acordaba de todo pero no podã­a concretar detalles como que no me lo querã­a creer e intentaba buscar explicaciones, incluso he estado unos aã±os como si se me hubiera olvidado, incluso me planteã© cuando empecã© a recordar la posibilidad de ir a que me hicieran una sesiã³n de imnosis para saber realmente si lo que me venã­a a la mente en flases era real o me lo estaba inventando, hasta que poco a poco he ido asimilã¡ndolo y recordando hasta el mã¡s mã­nimo detalle, y por muy inverosã­mil, raro, increã­ble... que le parezca ahora estoy convencido totalmente de lo que vi, se lo que vi y no tengo la menor duda. se de gente de la zona que tambien ha visto en el mismo sitio y en ã©poca diferente.
content.summary: Nave nodriza  forma de disco aprox 200.000m2 suspendida en el aire, y seis aparatos mas pequeã‘os que ascienden y se introducen en nave

content.detailedDescription:
i had just purchased a new camera and decided to take it to bluff park in long beach to take some test shots. i was shooting on a canon t3i and using my 18-55 lens.  the temperature was in the mid seventies and it was a very windy day. with the combination of the wind and sand and not wanting to damage my new camera i only took a few shots and then decided to find another place to shoot.  

  it wasn't until a few days later while using the zoom feature on my camera that i even noticed the object/objects.  i noticed the white triangle object and the single engine aircraft just to the upper right of it. i then went frame by frame with my zoom feature and found a bunch of smaller objects of different shapes and sizes towards the left side of the frame and i'm not sure if they either.  as i previously mentioned, i never saw or heard any of the objects being that they were so far away. when i looked at the shots i just felt a little confused and i would love it if your organization could find some answers.  i showed the photos to a bunch of friends using the lcd screen on my camera.  one of my friends offered to isolate the objects and convert the photos to jpeg. the photos i am attaching are in jpg, i still have the raw footage on my sd card stored in a safe place. feel free to contact me by email or phone should you have any questions.
content.summary: Photo taken

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
on december 25, 2014 a.D. just after supper, my uncle and i was having a cigarette, when we saw an orange light that kept a constant speed, and it traveled from a southern direction to a northern. then the object appeared to head east and began ascending in altitude. while it was turning i watched it, so that if there were any other colored lights i may see them. there was only the orange color. after we lost sight of it another object appeared.
 
 if i would have blinked i would have missed it. this light traveled in a straight line. from the ground up. impossibly fast. the acceleration was not gradual, but immediate. the distance it covered was astonishing, and it went straight up. silvery/white not unlike a star. neither object made any sound, and the maneuverability they possessed was unlike anything i have ever seen. when the orange one turned, it didn't seem bank in it's turn. just a hard immediate turn. also the light emitted from them was strange. it was a light that seemed to be without luminosity, but the light wasn't dim either....Shortly after the silvery/white object left i began to hear a chopper. it was travelling east at high altitude, and the same direction as the orange lit object. the chopper may have been just a coincidence. but the timing of it's arrival has my eyebrow raised.
 
 i live near a tiny private airport, and tiny is an understatement. it doesn't have any searchlights or control tower, and the aircraft it's able to support are small. this is an airport where retired pilots and rich aircraft enthusiasts move to. i know what airplanes, jets, and choppers sound like. and i understand the maneuverability of airplanes and helicopters. what i saw that night were not planes!
these were not helicopters! they were not jets! and they were most definitely not fireworks or flares!
content.summary: The 1st was orange in color, the 2nd was silvery/white

content.detailedDescription: my brother and i were waiting at a stop light facing east at highway 58 and washington avenue in golden, co. in late oct. or early nov. 2014. this was sometime in the daytime, probably in the afternoon, clear skies and full sun. we noticed at about 45 degrees to our right, just over south table mountain and to the east of the feature called castle rock, a totally stationary object in the sky. i remember it as being a light silver color and my brother remembers white, but still close. we both agree it was perfectly spherical and probably about 20-30 feet in diameter if it was at the distance we thought, somewhere over s. table mountain. i think my brother saw it first and said something like " what is that?". we briefly discussed what we each saw and agreed we saw the same thing. we watched this for about 30 seconds until the stoplight turned green and we turned left and lost sight of it. it appeared to be only a few degrees above the mountain, maybe 100-200 ft. altitude if it was at the distance assumed. if it was much further away, of course it would have been much larger and higher in altitude. upon discussing it later, we both agreed it probably was not a weather or hot air balloon because it was perfectly round and had nothing hanging underneath it. obviously planes, helicopters, the moon, venus and other celestial objects can be ruled out as this was full daylight. since it was motionless and nothing happened, i kind of forgot about it until i happened across a video on youtube called the crestone ufo of oct. 3 2014. they (2) appear to be almost the same thing we saw, only they have a darker appearing center, making them appear concave. ours appeared totally spherical. then i found several other videos of very similar things in breckenridge (filmed by a tv station) and around pueblo reservoir (i think) at around the same time as our sighting. i wish i had reported this earlier so i could better remember the date and exact time, but i do recall this was after the tv report which i had missed when it aired.
content.summary: At stoplight, 2 people saw 1 perfectly round stationary object maybe 25' diameter for about 30 seconds at about 1.5 miles

content.detailedDescription:
I have a drone , in december 25 a friend tell mee there are a lot of people and police next to street looking for crop circles and i come with the drone to take the only aerial take before people come inside circles an destroy it.

i don't know if there is a crop circle but i want to share this video with you 

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Crop circle

content.detailedDescription:
I randomly take pictures of the moon so i think these were taken on the night of the blood moon on october 8th, however the moon is so bright that this might be a different night. i can provide that data once this is looked at. i thought nothing of the speck in the photograph until i blew it up and saw a brilliant spiral light and some type of bright object next to the spiral. i'll send the original picture and a 400% zoomed photograph of the object in questions. 

thank you
content.summary: A symmetrical sprial of light caught by accident when i was taking pictures of the lunar eclipse

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of december 18th 2014 i took my dog for a walk. on the way back home i saw a large pumpkin colored ord in the atmosphere. there were planes in the air so i could make a 
size comparison. if the lights on the wings of an air plan are the size of your pinky finger then the size of the orb would be the size of your clinched fist. i watched it for what seemed to be a few minutes then blinked a few times then disappeared. 
i'll never go out without my camera again.
content.summary: Spotted a large pumpkin colored orb in the sky while walking my dog at night.

content.detailedDescription:
on december 25, 2014 at approximately 5-7 pm, my wife and i went out onto our side porch to smoke a cigarette. my wife was sitting in the chair on the right side of the porch, i was standing on the left side of the porch facing the street.
   when i go out to smoke i always have a habit of looking up to the sky. during the day it's usually to look at the clouds and the clear blue sky. at nighttime i always enjoy looking at the stars and the planet's if there are any visible. i was standing next to my wife discussing the days events, after all it was christmas day. i did what i always do, that is turn around, face the street and lean over the rail to get a better view of the night sky. i was looking to see if jupiter had peeked over the horizon in the southeastern sky. it was still too early and i did not see jupiter at that time. as i scanned the heavens above, another very bright object caught my eye. the first thing that got my attention was the brightness of the object, the second thing that caught my eye was when i noticed that it wasn't a star or planet because it was moving.
   well, my first impression was that it was a star or planet. until i noticed that it was moving. my second impression was that it was an airliner, small plane or a helicopter. i ruled these out for several reasons. first, there were no red or green navigation lights located on the wing tips. secondly, there were no anti-collision beacon lights that should have been colored a reddish orange and had a flashing effect on the bottom of the fuselage. thirdly, there were no high-intensity strobe lights that should've been located on each wing tip. these lights would have been bright white flashing lights. if the object had been an airliner, small plane or a helicopter it was surly low enough to have made a jet engine or helicopter rotor sound. but it was absolutely silent. besides i think it was too high to have been a helicopter. the other possible object that i thought it could've been was a satellite or the international space station. however, this was not a possibility due to the fact that it looked as if it was flying below cloud level. and it was extremely bright. i've seen satellites fly across the horizon, they have always been a lot dimmer and fly across the heavens much faster.
   i first noticed the object almost directly over my head. it was moving from a northwest to a southeast direction. it moved in a straight flight path and seemed to have reduced speed for a few seconds and then it looked as if it had sped back up to or beyond the speed it was traveling when i first caught sight of the object. i watched the object for approximately 15 - 20 seconds. i don't believe the object ever moved vertically during the time that i observed it moving across the sky.
   my first reaction was one of puzzlement. since the object was flying at what seemed to be below cloud level, the lack of any sounds coming from it and the fact that it was extremely bright kind of threw me back for a second. after going through all of the possibilities that would've made sense and coming to the determination that this was not an airplane or a helicopter, my mind felt a little strange and i felt like i had an emptiness in my gut. its the kind of feeling you get when you can't explain a situation with basic logic or facts. however, a few seconds after coming to this conclusion it became less of a puzzlement and i became more intrigued. it amazes me how so many thoughts your mind can produce in a few seconds. after the entire incident i was still quite puzzled. my brain was attempting to make sense out of something that it couldn't register as a normal event. at the same time i wanted to do everything possible to figure out what had transpired. for the rest of the evening, christmas night, all the way up to today, i am still very intrigued about the event. i have visited several websites checking to see if anyone else in my neighborhood or in my general area had seen the object that i saw that night.
   i wanted to explain how i lost sight of the object for the last paragraph. anyway, as i was watching the object fly from a slight northwest to a southeast direction for approximately 15 - 20 seconds, in a straight flight path. the object was almost traveling from the west to the east. suddenly, flying across the horizon from a southern to a northern direction, another object came into view. however, there is no mistaking what this object was in the distance. it had the red and green navigation lights, the flashing reddish orange anti-collision lights and it had the flashing white high-intensity strobe lights. this object was moving at a high rate of speed, fast enough to realize that it could not have been a commercial airliner or a helicopter. and even though this object was farther away i could most definitely hear the roar of the jet engines. as the slower bright object flew toward the southwest, and the faster object was flying toward the north, i could see both of them in the distance. as the faster object moved fairly close to the slower object the most puzzling event took place. the slower object simply vanished. the object simply looked as if it blinked out of existence. it looked as if the faster object had changed its direction after the disappearance of the slow bright object. i think the fighter went from flying north, to flying in the same southeastern direction the other object was traveling before it disappeared.
   i am by no means an expert on military aircraft. nor am i an expert on unidentified flying objects. however, i do have enough common sense and the eyes and the ears to realize that what i was experience was not normal. the way the bright unidentified flying object looked as it flew overhead, without making a sound was an event i have never experienced. and the feeling i got throughout my body was one i rarely experience. it was a strange but cool experience. 
   thank you for taking the time to read the details of my experience. and if someone in northwest baltimore county experienced the same event, on 12/25/2014, please leave a reply.
content.summary: Ufo,  northwest baltimore county, 12/25/2014,  vanished as faster object seemed to give chase.

content.detailedDescription: The 3 of us were returning home from a shopping and witnessed very bright and glowing orbs. there were 5, 4 in a formation of one behind the other, and another further behind trailing them but it was an identical type. we initially considered radio towers or planes, but planes flash and don't go that slow, and towers don't fly and hover. the orbs then spread out over the hills after passing over houses and literally dissolved into the air. two remained 10 minutes later when we stopped at a cornfield to observe. i myself have had a long fascination with aliens and the ufo phenomena, so this was a real eye-catcher. we all saw it, and i plan on inquiring at the local air-force bases if they had 5 vehicles on routine drills flying that low and slow due east at this time of night which i highly doubt. i want to know what they were and i've had sightings before but i just had a feeling this was it. they hovered and moved very very slow. too slow for planes. i have pictures and videos but they are difficult to distinguish. however, two other people saw them as well. we lost sight after 3 dissolved and 2 flew behind the treeline so we never saw sight of it again.
content.summary: Driving home. spotted a line of orbs in a formation: 4 near eachother, one tailing further behind.

content.detailedDescription: Had to pop up to my bedroom to bring something diownstairs. as i was collecting the item from a drawer by the bedroom window my eyes were drawn to an orange lozenge shaped light around 1cm wide at arms length out past the top of the houses opposite mine. in the space of around 10-20 seconds of viewing the light it switched off. i checked outside straight after the sighting and heard no sound of aircraft, the only sounds outside were the  sound of distant traffic and a dog barking.
content.summary: Orange lozenge shaped light out past houses opposite, switched off after 10 - 15 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
I was soaking in my hot tub at a few minutes after 10pm, with limited view of the sky past a porch roof and canopy.  i noticed, in the ene sky, a globe or orb gliding in a straight line at a slow rate of speed.

it was orange/yellow/pink -ish, hard to choose which color, but not changing colors.  i thought of a candle balloon, but there was no flickering or wavering of the color as a flame would provide.  it seemed to glide rather than fly, was my impression....

it seemed to be relatively low in the sky, just a few hundred feet, and if that were the case the orb would have been maybe about 10ft in diameter.  but i have no way of knowing how realistic that would be.  it was just a thought.....  it stayed at an even rate of speed, never varying.

as it approached the edge of my vision at the roofline, i leaned over as far as i could to keep it in view, and realized that there was absolutely no sound attached to it, and the neighborhood was very quiet at the time.  i felt, at the time, that it wasn't wise to connect so strongly to it visually, that i should look away, but i didn't.  then it disappeared out of my line of sight.  even after i couldn't see it anymore i could hear no backwash of sound from a motor or anything.

all of the above took about 1 minute of time to happen.
content.summary: Glowing orb in near sky, gliding east to west in a straight line

content.detailedDescription: 1 sitting  in friends car.2 we were lookig for a satillit to come over.3 a sattilit please just call me ive got a  bit to say and  i dont  type good.
content.summary: Saw 5 strange the way it happend

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard viewing the sky and moon with my telescope approximately around 17:00. what made me notice the object was its shape it seems to look like a bio-hazard symbol. at first i thought it was just dirt on my lens but i barely had the switched out form the store therefore, i keep on viewing the object. the motion of it was stationary until it eventually turned out to have a other object come out of it. also in the shape of a circle. both where stationary over the moon until they took off. i was impressed by how quickly it took off. eventually i lost sight of the object/s when they flew away from the moon.
content.summary: Hovered over moon then took off after a couple seconds

content.detailedDescription: Just trying to take a picture of a rainbow when i looked closely seen things in clouds
content.summary: Didn't know that they were there until i closely observed pic

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling on i-20 from powder springs georgia, headed towards new orleans. between lincoln and pell city alabama, a bright flash of silvery-white light appeared to the south west in the distance (about 15 miles away) close to the ground in the horizon. immediately after noticing the bright white light towards the ground, the entire night sky illuminated a bright fluorescent blue for approximately 3 to 4 seconds. the light seems to have been projected from the ground up. it was so bright that the night sky appeared as day. 

after about 4 seconds, the light pulsed and went away, returning the sky back dark. 

no sound was heard during the time of noticing the event.  right before noticing the event, i was playing music through my car radio. my cell phone signal was loss resulting in the music cutting out, then a few seconds later i observed the event. 

i did not notice any thing falling from the sky or a trail or anything. the only colors witnessed was a bright white/silver flash of light, followed by the entire sky turning a fluorescent blue.
content.summary: Bright silver/white light immediately followed by entire sky illuminating fluorescent blue

content.detailedDescription: I was at the warehouse dock directing a trailer into position. there was a helicopter hovering up high and slowly backing up. thats when i noticed these 4 orbs at a much higher altitude hovering , then slowly began to rotate in a circle. three of my employees came out to see what i was looking at and they also saw the orbs. the truck driver also witnessed the orbs. suddenly the orbs started to separate out and in slowly moving north. thats when they got in the formation in the picture moving faster. then they formed in a single file and flew over the warehouse. the flying pattern was from southeast to the north. our dock faces south. the helicopter had no markings whatsoever and was facing towards the orbs as it slowly backed away. we are near hobby airport and noticed that there were no planes taking off or landing except for this one helicopter.  about 15 minutes after we lost sight of the orbs, we noticed airplane traffic as usual. one of my employees has a video that he shot with his phone which i can get if requested.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White helicopter hovering up high with orbs at higher altitude circling erratically, getting in formation then shooting off in a straight line

content.detailedDescription: I had left a friend's home in e. oceanside a few minutes after 10pm (i noticed the time exactly on my car radio because i wanted to hear a program that started at 10:07). i drove west on oceanside blvd. and about a half mile west of the college blvd. intersection, the road slightly curved and i saw what looked exactly like a giant half moon, as big as the super moons we had seen over the late summer, but it was a half moon, bright orangey-yellow. all aspects were exactly like the moon, but it was too close to the horizon, and a little too big, and since i look up in the sky most nights when i take my dog out, i knew that everything about this was wrong! it scared me to death, i made a quick u-turn and called my friend and told him i was coming back, i needed him to see something and i quickly drove back to his house. we returned to the spot no more than 7-8 minutes later, and to the southwest a large glow could be seen between the trees, but there were obstructions (houses, hills, trees) and nothing could be seen clearly. he saw the glow, but no finite shape. as we drove back to his house, he kept looking out the back window, and couldn't see anything else. when i drove the same route again 10 minutes later, i could see no remains of the earlier light. i looked at the 11:00 news and searched the internet this morning, but haven't seen any news of this. it was incredible, and really scared me, i thought it was going to be some sort of end times thing, i'm still shaking to think about it. i started crying on the way home because i felt like no one would believe me. someone else had to see this!!!
content.summary: A huge 'half moon' clearly visible just over the horizon
